Title: P-2 PILOT COMPARTMENT
description: Roll 2D per shell hit on Pilot Compartment

3.description: Roll wound for each separately on Table BL-4

4.description: Roll for wound on Table BL-4

5.description: Roll for wound on Table BL-4

8.description: Roll 1D: 1,2 = guns inoperable; 3-5 = Engineer rolls for wound on Table BL-4; 6 = guns inoperable and Engineer rolls for wound

sub_roll.3-5: Engineer rolls for wound on Table BL-4
sub_roll.6: Top turret guns inoperable and Engineer rolls for wound on Table BL-4

9.description: Roll for damage on Table BL-2

10.description: Roll 1D: 1 = Pilot and Co-Pilot; 2 = Pilot; 3 = Co-Pilot; 4,5 = Engineer; 6 = Fire and all Pilot Compartment oxygen out

sub_roll.6: Fire and all Pilot Compartment oxygen out. Roll to extinguish fire on Table BL-3

11.description: 1st window hit = no effect; 2nd window hit = landing roll on Table G-9 or G-10 -1; Additional hits = no effect

12.description: 1st hit = no effect; 2nd hit (anywhere in B-17) = No Evasive Action allowed, landing roll on Table G-9 or G-10 -1, and Bomb Run is automatically Off Target

notes: See rules sections for Oxygen Out, Heat Out/Frostbite, and Aborting the Mission
